name: Peur Estate (Episode 1)
description:
Amanda has been kidnapped and finds herself waking up in a basement full of the spirits of the manors other victims. Slowly find out more about the manor and why you've been called to it.

Episode 1 - Can you find your way out of the basement?

Creator Note: This is the first part in a 4-part narrative driven story that I had planned out quite a while ago but never got around to finishing since I have worked on other projects. Figured with Covid going on, i'd get this one done and out of the way and see what things I can improve on for future titles. Appreciate all comments, good or bad. Thanks for playing!

Keyboard Controls

  • WASD Keys - Move
  • Mouse - Move Flashlight
  • E - Interact 
  • B - Close UI
  • F - Turn On/Off Flashlight
  • R - Add Battery
  • M - Open Map
  • Esc - Pause Screen
